participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, always seeking new experiences.
participant_1.background: my father was a door to door salesman. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i have three dogs. i like to watch the olympics.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Reflective and artistic, with a hint of mischief in her dreams of power.
participant_2.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i am a 56 year old woman.
